summary: A composer and his sister discover that the reason they are able to purchase a beautiful gothic seacoast mansion very cheaply is the house's unsavory past.
cast: Ray Milland|Ruth Hussey|Donald Crisp|Cornelia Otis Skinner|Dorothy Stickney|Barbara Everest|Alan Napier|Gail Russell|David Clyde|Betty Farrington|Helena Grant|Lynda Grey|Holmes Herbert|Leyland Hodgson|John Kieran|Queenie Leonard|Moyna MacGill|Jessica Newcombe|Rita Page|Elizabeth Russell|Ivan F. Simpson|Evan Thomas
title: Los intrusos
